actionCalls.name: myRule_3_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Meeting notes to BCP V PWM

actionCalls.label: Send Email Notes to BSIP PWM

rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: Has BPREP Desc Been Updated for PW?

value.stringValue: AND ( NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), ISNEW(), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BPREP", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND ( NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), ISNEW(), {!myVariable_current.EndDateTime} < Now(), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name} = "BPREP", OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )
